hanzi-su-wiki:
酒

Значения

Рисовая водка; алкоголь, выпивка; пьянство

Мнемоника

  • Бутылка 酉 с жидкостью 氵, вином.

  • "Из хорошей воды получается хороший алкоголь."

вино (особенно рисовое вино); ликер; духи; алкогольный напиток; Классификаторы: 杯

heisig_chinese_memo: Liquor, like whiskey, is a watered down form of pure alcohol.
heisig_constituent: sake, water, water droplets, water pistol, whiskey bottle
koohiiStory1: Sake is just watered down whisky.
koohiiStory2: Sake is the generic term for alcohol (not just japanese rice wine). And a very popular alcoholic drink in Japan is whiskey and water.
jp_example_words:
酒場(さかば): bar, bar-room
酒(さけ): alcohol, sake
お酒(おさけ): (polite) wine, sake
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami is an alcoholic beverage containing a lot of alcohol. It’s 3 different kinds of rums, pineapple juice, and grenadine. It’ll hit you like a tsunami though. This alcoholic drink has a kick to it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It’s made with spiced rum, coconut rum, and dark rum. Imagine yourself on a sandy beach drinking this cocktail. Feel the sun on your face and the wind in your hair as you sip on this fruity and rummy alcoholic beverage known as a tsunami. You could even picture an actual tsunami in the water coming right for you. I wouldn’t recommend it though—actual tsunami are scary, not drinkable and delicious.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you lay on this beach, the alcohol keeps coming down a chute (しゅ), straight into your mouth. You can feel the sand in your toes and the alcohol sliding down your throat from this special tsunami chute.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the alcohol flowing down this long chute from somewhere far away. You try to see where it's coming from, but all you can see is this long, long chute stretching along the entire beach, until it disappears into the distance. You should probably be concerned that you're nonstop drinking alcohol from a random chute, but it tastes so good!
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 洒 (すす.ぐ、シャ).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the water (氵) in the sake flask (酉) is sake
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Liquor, like whiskey, is a watered down form of pure alcohol.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Grain is used to make alcohol. By different methods such as fermentation or distillation, alcoholic beverages are made. In ancient times, when grain was scarce, only the rich could afford such a luxury. (酒, jiu, alcoholic drink) means alcoholic drink. This character is a combination of the one that signifies water (水, shui, water) and a pot to hold the water. Wine/alcoholic beverages were considered to be sacred, so they were used mostly for religious ceremonies or special festivities.
humanum_full_description_en:
" unitary " In addition to being " wine " sound character, or signifier, the ancient word " unitary " statue like wine, from the " water " means in the bottle wines.

Oracle is used as the original meaning of wine, and also used as place names. Bronze " wine " are writing the word " unitary " see " unitary ."

Throughout the ages, drinking has been an important pastime for people. Drinking and drinking, banqueting and entertaining guests. There are many ancient books. Bai Juyi's "Beiting Invites Guests": "The prime ministers of Gesan County, the leisurely official residences arrive at the mountain home. Spring Breeze Beihu Thousand-stem bamboo, one tree flower in the East Garden in the evening. Xiaozhan tastes cold wine and smashes new tea in the deep furnace. Can you come to the Japanese palace to guess?

Xu Shen's interpretation of " wine " with " just " is a sound instruction. "Shuowen": "Wine is the same, so it is the good and evil of human nature. From the water to the unity, the unitary also sounds. One said: the creation of the same, the good and the bad. The ancient Yidi made the wine, and the Yu tasted it. Beauty, then Tong Yidi. Du Kang made wine."
humanum_short_description_en: " Wine " from " water ", " unitary " is also sound, " unitary " like the bottle, the original meaning of wine.
humanum_full_description:
「酉」除了是「酒」的聲符，還是意符，古文字「酉」象酒尊，從「水」表示酒瓶裏的美酒佳釀。

　　甲骨文用作本義，表示酒，又用作地名。金文「酒」字皆寫作「酉」，參見「酉」。

　　古往今來，飲酒是人們的重要消遣，酌酒歡飲，宴客娛賓，古書多載，白居易〈北亭招客〉：「踈散郡丞同野客，幽閑官舍抵山家。春風北戶千莖竹，晩日東園一樹花。小盞吹醅嘗冷酒，深爐敲火炙新茶。能來盡日宮棊否？太守知慵放晚衙。」

　　許慎以「就」釋「酒」，屬聲訓。《說文》：「酒，就也，所以就人性之善惡。从水从酉，酉亦聲。一曰：造也，吉凶所造也。古者儀狄作酒醪，禹嘗之而美，遂䟽儀狄。杜康作秫酒。」
humanum_short_description: 「酒」從「水」，「酉」亦聲，「酉」象酒瓶，本義是美酒。

「 酉 」除了是「 酒 」的聲符，還是意符，古文字「 酉 」象酒尊，從「 水 」表示酒瓶裏的美酒佳釀。 甲骨文用作本義，表示酒，又用作地名。金文「 酒 」字皆寫作「 酉 」，參見「 酉 」。 古往今來，飲酒是人們的重要消遣，酌酒歡飲，宴客娛賓，古書多載，白居易〈北亭招客〉：「踈散郡丞同野客，幽閑官舍抵山家。春風北戶千莖竹，晩日東園一樹花。小盞吹醅嘗冷酒，深爐敲火炙新茶。能來盡日宮棊否？太守知慵放晚衙。」 許慎以「 就 」釋「 酒 」，屬聲訓。《說文》：「酒，就也，所以就人性之善惡。从水从酉，酉亦聲。一曰：造也，吉凶所造也。古者儀狄作酒醪，禹嘗之而美，遂䟽儀狄。杜康作秫酒。」

酒字的基本解释

酒
jiǔ
用高粱、米、麦或葡萄等发酵制成的含乙醇的饮料：白酒。啤酒。料酒。鸡尾酒。茅台酒。酒浆。

酒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǔ］
［《廣韻》子酉切，上有，精。］
(1)饮料名。用粮食、水果等含淀粉或糖的物质发酵制成的含乙醇的饮料。
(2)饮酒。
(3)酒席，酒筵。
(4)姓。见《通志·氏族四》。

酒字的英文翻译

◎ 酒
alcohol, diddle, drink, tiff, tipple, vino, vintage, water of life, wet goods

酒字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　酒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1281第03
【唐韻】子酉切，愀上聲。【說文】就也，所以就人性之善惡。一曰造也。吉凶所造也。【釋名】酒，酉也，釀之米麴，酉澤久而味美也。亦言踧也，能否皆彊相踧持飮之也。又入口咽之，皆踧其面也。【周禮·天官·酒正】辨三酒之物，一曰事酒，二曰昔酒，三曰淸酒。【註】事酒，有事而飮也。昔酒，無事而飮也。淸酒，祭祀之酒。【前漢·食貨志】酒，百藥之長。【東方朔傳】銷憂者莫若酒。【江純·酒誥】酒之所興，肇自上皇，成之帝女，一曰杜康。　又?酒，明水也。【禮·明堂位】夏后氏尚明水，殷尚醴，周尚酒。　又天酒，甘露也。【瑞應圖】王者施德惠，則甘露降，一名天酒。　又官名。【周禮·天官】酒正。【註】酒官之長。【又】女酒。【註】女奴曉酒者。　又祭酒，尊稱之號。【前漢·伍被傳】號爲劉氏祭酒。【註】祭時惟尊長酹酒也。　又酒旗，星名。【曹植·酒賦】仰漢旗之景曜，協嘉號於天辰。　又地名。【左傳·莊二十二年】王與虢公酒泉之邑。【註】邑在河南。又【前漢·武帝紀】以其地爲武威酒泉郡。【註】酒泉，今肅

酒字的源字形

酒字的起名意思

用粮食（高粱、麦、米等）或水果等发酵制成的含乙醇的饮料，有刺激性。

Basic explanation of words
liqueur
jiǔ
Ethanol-containing beverages made from the fermentation of sorghum, rice, wheat or grapes: white wine. beer. Cooking wine. cocktail. Moutai. Wine syrup.
liqueur
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǔ］
["Guangyun" sub-unitary cut, upper and fine. ]
(1) The name of the drink. Ethanol-containing beverages made by fermenting starch or sugar-containing substances such as grains and fruits.
(2) Drinking alcohol.
(3) Banquet, wine feast.
(4) Last name. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".

酒
酒
甲骨文的“酒”字,中间是一
个酒瓶,两旁是流出来的酒液(或
作水旁)。全文往往用“西”字代替
“酒”字,或者说,“西”、“酒”二字
是通用的,小。后才分开。
酒
D
ликер
джиŭ
ликер
ликер
Слово «вино» в надписях из оракульной кости имеет винную бутылку посередине, а ликер вытекает с обеих сторон (или рядом с водой).
В полном тексте часто используется слово «西» вместо слова «jiu», или что слова «xi» и «jiu» являются обычными и маленькими.
Отдельно позже.
ликер
jiǔ

спиртное; вино; водка; алкоголь; алкогольные напитки; алкогольный; винный; также родовое слово или морфема в названиях алкогольных напитков

高粱酒 гаоляновая водка

啤酒 пиво
白酒 водка
II собств.
Цзю (фамилия)

酒

Значения

Рисовая водка; алкоголь, выпивка; пьянство

Мнемоника

  • Бутылка 酉 с жидкостью 氵, вином.

  • "Из хорошей воды получается хороший алкоголь."
Radicals: 氵, 酉  (tsunami, alcohol)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami is an alcoholic beverage containing a lot of alcohol. It’s 3 different kinds of rums, pineapple juice, and grenadine. It’ll hit you like a tsunami though. This alcoholic drink has a kick to it.
It’s made with spiced rum, coconut rum, and dark rum. Imagine yourself on a sandy beach drinking this cocktail. Feel the sun on your face and the wind in your hair as you sip on this fruity and rummy alcoholic beverage known as a tsunami. You could even picture an actual tsunami in the water coming right for you. I wouldn’t recommend it though—actual tsunami are scary, not drinkable and delicious.
Reading Mnemonic
As you lay on this beach, the alcohol keeps coming down a chute (しゅ), straight into your mouth. You can feel the sand in your toes and the alcohol sliding down your throat from this special tsunami chute.
Picture the alcohol flowing down this long chute from somewhere far away. You try to see where it's coming from, but all you can see is this long, long chute stretching along the entire beach, until it disappears into the distance. You should probably be concerned that you're nonstop drinking alcohol from a random chute, but it tastes so good!
